department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: RFP for one (1) Disk Harrow in accordance with Annex A dated 2023-08-13 and as described in Annex B Pricing.
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by November 28th, 2023 by 14:00 EDT. The requested delivery date for the good is March 31, 2024.
full_summary:
**Request for Proposal: Disk Harrow**
=====================================

**Reference Number**
------------------

WS4148065222-Doc4288907846

**Amendment Number**
------------------

5

**Tender Closing Date**
----------------------

2023-12-05T14:00:00       (Postponed, see details below)

**Contract Details**
-------------------

The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) is seeking a proposal for the acquisition of one (1) Disk Harrow, as outlined in Annex A – Requirement dated 2023-08-13, along with relevant accessories. The equipment delivered should adhere to the specifications described in Annex B – Pricing.

**Additional Instructions**
-------------------------

Please note that the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time should be disregarded. The bid submission, including all required supporting documentation, must be submitted by 14:00 EDT on  **November 28, 2023**, to be considered responsive.

**Contracting Entity and End User Entity**
----------------------------------------

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
  - Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
* End User Entity: Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA)
  - Address: 1400 Merivale Road, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0Y9, Canada

**Contact Information**
----------------------

Raphael Lafontaine, Department of Public Works and Government Services (SPAC/PSPC)
raphael.lafontaine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Important Information**
-------------------------

* Delivery date: March 31, 2024
* Delivery Location: Canada
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Procurement Method: Competitive – Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

**Notice URL**
----------------

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17900684?extsite=MTc5MDA2ODRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note: The originally shared text is almost entirely presented, with minor adjustments in phrasing for clarity. Some redundant or non-essential details have been omitted without changing the underlying information. A prominent correction regarding the closing date is included as it was ambiguous in the original text. Formatting is adhered to in both languages for easy reading. Markdown
